name: Flip Bottle AR
description:
Flip Bottle AR
is the new upcoming Augmented Reality arcade game! In this game, you're supposed to hit the flipping bottle with your finger and split it perfectly in half! Just find a correct spot for Augmented Reality level and start slicing! Try to get highest score!

Features:
- Real, markerless Augmented Reality system based on NEW IOS 11 AR KIT!
- Play with friends!
- Play inside your room!
- Play outside your house!
- Play in your school!
- Play anywhere you want!
- Extra 'bullet time' game mode for fast and precise cuttings!

With the new Augmented Reality (AR) Technology, everything is possible!

This game is using Advanced Procedural Cutting algorithm, which ensures that each and every of your splits is realistic and unique!
Immerse into the new procedural, augmented reality-powered 3D experience and challenge your friends in endless flying bottles hunt!
